titleStmt.title: SII 7.142: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 142. (A.R. No. 129 of 1900). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumakaḷ polap perunilaccelviyu n=tanakke Urimai pūṇṭamai manakkoḷak kān=taḷuṟcālai kalamaṟuttu veṅkaināṭum kaṅkapāṭiyum nuḷampapāṭiyu n=taṭiyaivaḻiyuṅ kuṭamalaināṭuṅ kollamuṅ kaliṅkamum Eṇṭicai puka
ḻtara Īḻamaṇṭala muḻuvatum Iraṭṭapāṭi Eḻarai Ilakkamu n=tiṇṭiṟal veṉṟit taṇṭāṟ koṇṭu tanṉeḻil vaḷar ŪḻiUḷ Ellā yāṇṭu n=toḻutakai viḷaṅkum yāṇṭe ceḻiyarait tecukoḷ śrīkovirājarājakecarivanmarāna śrīrājarājadevaṟku
yāṇṭu 2 10 3Āvatu milāṭāna jananātavaḷanāṭṭuk kuṟukkaikkūṟṟattu brahmadeyam Attanamponnūrccaturvetimaṅkalattu sabhaiyiṭai vāṇakappāṭip peṇṇai vaṭakarai brahmadeyaM maṇalūr paruṭaiyāruḷ kaucikan Aṇṇāvan
tiruvikkiraman vilaikoṇṭa nilam viḷan=taikkolāl Irunūṟṟaimpattāṟu kuḻi koṇṭatu Orumāvāka vilaikoṇṭa nilam Eḻumāvaraiyum koṇṭu vilaidravyamum Iṟaidravyamuṅ kaiyile Aṟakkoṇṭu Iṟaiyiḻiccik kuṭuttom
Attanamponnūr sabhaiyom Aṇṇāvan tiruvikkiramanukku In=nilattukku nir vilaikkūliyum collappeṟātomānom sabhaiyom brahmadeya n=tirukkovalūr tiruviṭaikaḻiĀḻvārkku Iṉṉilam Eḻumāvaraiyum Iṟaiyili vilaiko
ṇṭu kuṭutta nilam Ittevar tevatānam ciñciliveliyoṭuṅ kiḻakkaṭaiya Eḻumāvaraiyuṅ koṇṭu Ellaikkal naṭṭukkuṭutten Aṇṇāvaṉ tiruvikkiramaneṉ Innilaṅ koṇṭu Istānattu vaikānasarom ceyvitāna nivan=tam Uttaramayana
mum dekṣiṇa mayanamum tirumañcaṇam kaḻañce Eḻumañcāṭiyum kaḻañce Eḻumañcāṭiyum ponner Iraṇṭu tirumañcaṇamuñ ceytu Ipponnil tirumañcaṇamtoṟum Eṇṇāḻikkālālk kalakkala Arici Amutuceyvittu neyyamutu Irunāḻiyuṅ kaṟiAmutu Āṟum
tayiramutu patakkum Aṭaikkāyamutu nūṟum veṟṟilai nālu paṟṟum puḷiṅkaṟi Amutukku puḷi Aimpalamum caṟkkarai Aimpalamum kaṭuku Uḻakkum miḷaku Āḻakkum kalacam nūṟṟeṭṭum snamanadravyaṅkaḷ Aṉaiccum kalacattiṉ kiḻaṭṭu nellu 1kalamum
viṟakum Āṟṟi nīrum Ācāriyapūcaṉaiyum puṭavai nālum snamanattukku veṇṭuvana Ellāṅ kuṟaivaṟuttu Innilaṅ koṇṭu ceyyakkaṭavom stānattu vaikānasarom .
Digital edition of SII 7.142 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
